author: Oliver Knight
title: Donald Trump's Truth Social Files for Dual Bitcoin and Ether ETF
description: The move follows registration for a standalone Truth Social bitcoin ETF earlier this month.
content:
Trump Media and Technology Group (DJT) has filed to list a Truth Social Bitcoin and Ethereum exchange traded fund (ETF) on Monday.
The ETF will hold bitcoin 
 and ether directly with 75% of capital… [+889 chars]
